attributes.review: today was the day i decided mhm yes so i downloaded & all of my sudden my dog went barking i looked to see what it was she was barking at to find out there was two big giraffe horses on my couch in the store i said mhm so i went for water a i suddenly had to poop after i finished putting the gas in my car i went to sleep i then woke up to a mysterious sound i went to check it out it was my pet rolly polly i then asked my mom to see her car after i got from the firestation from getting a shot at the doctors office thank you
attributes.title: wow.

attributes.review: this app is very bad, when the app started downloading it was very slow for me it took 8 days 17 minutes and 46 seconds. On top of the long downloading time as soon as I opened the app my phone exploded! I am currently typing this on my tamagotchi, now I have to get a new iPhone 4🤬🤬. I tried to download this app on my friends android and the app still took forever to download! But my friends phone didn’t explode luckily, but as soon as we opened the app my friends phone started shouting racist and homophobic slurs!! WOULD NOT RECOMMEND 🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤯😡😡😡😡😡😡😠😠😠😤😫😫😩😱
attributes.title: WOULD NOT RECOMMEND

This is all your fault you orange skin sack.
